channel.title: [Req] Experience SRL scripter to tweak my script
channel.description:
I need an experienced SRL scripter to tweak a script that i wrote.
My script needs -Antiban -Antirandom (this will be even easier than usual) -Some random log in/outs -Random waits -Random stat hovering -Auto talk -Improved Server switch routine -some minor adjustments to improve my object finding.
All in all its probably only a 30 minute job for an experienced scripter, I have fully annotated my script to speed up the porcess even more :)
I will pay in RS2 gp and you may get the use of my script, which after approx 50 hours has earnt me just less than 8 mill profit ( running on one char). Contact me: please post here add me to msn: faith_321@hotmail.com Catch me on IRC #mopar
thanks.

I need an experienced SRL scripter to tweak a script that i wrote.

My script needs
-Antiban

-Some random log in/outs

All in all its probably only a 30 minute job for an experienced scripter, I have fully annotated my script to speed up the porcess even more
